Title: XEFFEX
Description: XEFFEX is a play off the piano gadget. The shapes were manipulated and the sounds are set to different effects. The end goal was too have the pads play a sound and execute a program the user can pre-choose. The options menu allows quit access to your files.

XEFFEX.Gadget

 

This gadget allows you to set different .wav files to the keys for your own custom sound synthesizer. It is a play on the piano gadget with lots of mods and no automatic behind the scenes updating. Its a perfect development example to build on and/or learn from. The desired result is to have programs of your choice launch with a sound of your choice. It has lots of portable potential as well as accessability potential. The Options menu (looks like a wrench) has a browse for files option (works) and an upload button (not programmed yet). Set this to play your programs like a synthesizer and you have one mean command console!!!
